testimonials.text: It was our pleasure to have you as our wedding planners for our Wedding in Jodhpur, Rajasthan.Our guest reallyn appreciated the cocktail night before the marriage where they were entertained by the Rajasthani Fold Dancers.
testimonials.name: ROHIT KUMAR

testimonials.text: To begin with we are extremely obliged to Okasion Xperts for organizing memorable for us. We are from New York and we had decided to have our weeding in an India following our culture and tradition.
testimonials.name: Babita Garg

testimonials.text: Thank you very much for helping us co-ordinate our wedding. We had a fantastic day and everything ran smoothly thanks tom your help. The ballroom looked amazing and the service was fantastic.
testimonials.name: Khushwant Singh

testimonials.text: Thank you for all your hard work in organising our wedding reception. Luke and I were extremely impressed with your professionalism and patience! We had an amazing time and we were very happy with the service
testimonials.name: Sumit Kumar

testimonials.text: Thank you, thank you, thank you for all your help, advice and support with planning our wedding at the InterContinental. The reception was unbelievable, exactly how we imagined and more!.
testimonials.name: Gurmit Singh
